name: Peace of Mind
blurb: A 2D side-scrolling adventure for mobile devices featuring a unique narrative twist on the perception of the world as you know it.

rewards.reward: Your name in the credits of the game ($1 donations page), your name on the website "Donations" page, a thank you email and an exclusive wallpaper with every contributors' name on it!
